class Inhouerscript[source]

Inhouerscript(software, fd) :: Base

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import configparser

config=configparser.ConfigParser()
config.read('pybiotools4p/default.ini')

ihr=Inhouerscript(config['software']['ihr'],config['hisat2'])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ihr

inhouserscript:IHR.R
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print(ihr)

In-house Rscripts rep, https://github.com/btrspg/bioinfo-rscripts
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ihr.cmd_version()

'echo inhouserscript:IHR.R ;IHR.R'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print(ihr.cmd_deg_deseq2('count','clinical','control','prefix'))

deseq2.R count \
            clinical \
            control \
            prefix
